Name: Clint
Text: Hmm I guess I owe you an apology.

Name: Sally
Text: You! Who are you working for?

Name: General Ghani
Text: Your so-called President was selling you out.

Name: Clarissa
Text: No, Clint, I think he's right.

Name: General Ghani
Text: He probably wanted to expand University into a kingdom, but he couldn't keep up with the payments...

Name: General Ghani
Text: So, Banktania sent us in to collect.

Name: General Ghani
Text: And they're not going to like that we're coming back empty handed.

Name: Clint
Text: Hmph. Who says you're going back?

Name: William
Text: We need to take him back to Professor Hewel..

Name: William
Text: He'll know what to do about the President.

Name: William
Text: I hope the professor is alright...
